title: Reliable, efficient delivery
subtitle: Powered by Technology
body: Our Artifical intelligence powered tools use millions of project data points to ensure that your project is successful

cards.title: Supervisor
cards.body: Monitors activity to identify project roadblocks

cards.title: Team Builder
cards.body: Scans our talent network to create the optimal team for your project

cards.title: Karma
cards.body: Regularly evaluates our talent to ensure quality

cards.title: Calculator
cards.body: Uses data from past projects to provide better delivery estimates
